author: Lao-Tzu
message: All difficult things have their origin in that which is easy, and great things in that which is small.
title: Thought of the day

author: Byron Pulsifer
message: You can be what you want to be. You have the power within and we will help you always.
title: Thought of the day

author: Johannes Gaertner
message: To speak gratitude is courteous and pleasant, to enact gratitude is generous and noble, but to live gratitude is to touch Heaven.
title: Thought of the day

author: Doug Larson
message: Wisdom is the reward you get for a lifetime of listening when you'd have preferred to talk.
title: Thought of the day
